name: Reddit on YouTube Easy Reading
description: This is a style for the add-on "Reddit on YouTube", available for Firefox. Makes text larger, and also makes the colors of the text more conducive for reading on the darker background of the add-on. You can edit the exact values below.
additional_info:
-- v1.1
- Fixed advanced settings

-- v1.0 
- Enlarges text from 100% to 160%
- Changes username text size from 100% to 130%
- Changes username and title color from dark blue to teal.
